org.frans.thesis.service
Interface CFTabletopServiceListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
CFMusicScene, CFPhotoScene
public interface CFTabletopServiceListener

An interface to allow objects to be notified about important events.

Method Summary
 void addMobileDevice(java.lang.String clientName, CFTabletopClientManager tabletopClientManager)
          Notifies this listener that a new mobile device has connected to the tabletop.
 void fileFinished(CFFile file, java.lang.String name)
          Notifies tis listener that a file has been transferred to the tabletop.
 void removeMobileDevice(java.lang.String name)
          Notifies this listener about a client that has disconnected from the tabletop.
 void setIdle(java.lang.String name)
          Notifies this listener about the status of a client that has been set to IDLE.
 

Method Detail

addMobileDevice

void addMobileDevice(java.lang.String clientName,
                     CFTabletopClientManager tabletopClientManager)
Notifies this listener that a new mobile device has connected to the tabletop.

Parameters:
clientName - The name of the client that has connected to the tabletop.
tabletopClientManager - The client manager that manages the new client.

fileFinished

void fileFinished(CFFile file,
                  java.lang.String name)
Notifies tis listener that a file has been transferred to the tabletop.

Parameters:
file - The file in question.
name - The name of the client that has sent the file.

removeMobileDevice

void removeMobileDevice(java.lang.String name)
Notifies this listener about a client that has disconnected from the tabletop.

Parameters:
name - The name of the disconnected client.

setIdle

void setIdle(java.lang.String name)
Notifies this listener about the status of a client that has been set to IDLE.

Parameters:
name - The name of the client in question.
